page.title: 01CLUBS, GROUPS AND SOCIETIES
page.content:
Clubs, Groups and Societies.
Silverdale village has a number of organisations that cater for members aged from 2 to 60+. For the very young there is a Toddler Group, from this they can move to the Playgroup before starting school in the term in which they will be five. The Senior citizens are able to join the Over 60's Club. Brownies, Cubs, Guides and Scouts provide uniformed youth organisations for children aged 7 to 15. Other groups include Handbell Ringers, Women's Institute, Painting Group, Mother's Union, Methodist Guild, Village Players, Friends of Silverdale School, Literary Circle, Church Bell-ringers, British and Foreign Bible Society, Horticultural Society and Sports Clubs.
